title: Be Under Arms &ndash; Let Shots Will Be Your Music 2014
description:
:	
Be Under Arms - Let Shots Will Be Your Music  (2014)

Well, here we go again with another new band.... another Debut album of heavy reverb. Once more I  have to inform you there's little information on this band, as with those before them.

The 'little info' scenario will not remain forever, because Be Under Arms are a very good band with a sound to match, it won't be long before they are better known within the walls of the rock fraternity. perfcci 

The band formed at the beginning of 2013, in Moscow, Russia by vocalists Anna and Vladimir, The band recorded their first EP "Way of the bullet" , and then in September 2013 released the single "Panem et Circenses" and In 2014 they release their first full-length album "Let shots will be your music".

Be Under Arms style, combines nu-metal , modern, groove and elements of alternative and hard rock. The concept of the band represents a unique atmosphere of old western music combined with steampunk in a modern, urbanized, world.

They are a melodical unit, 'measured' but eqaully intertwined with hurricane rhythms and heavy riffs. Both male and female vocals complement each other and take us on a trip to fury.

Band influences include Slipknot, Stone Sour, Five Finger Death Punch.

... and that's everything to be found. Have a listen, they can be compared to Cripper, the mighty German Thrash band and for that I know you won't be disappointed with what you hear, this is a worthy entry to the annuls of rock and metal history.



Discography:
Way of The Bullet [EP] 2013
Panem Et Circenses [Single] 2013
Let Shots Will Be Your Music [LP] NOVEMBER 2014
